page.title: 05Jobs People Do
page.content: We have made a survey of the{jobs}done by the{parents}of the children who live in our survey area, and for such a country place the results are {surprising.}Only{3 fathers}are connected solely with{farming,}1 pig farmer, 1 cattle and sheep farmer, and 1 farmworker. The others are business executive,mechanic(3),social services adviser, joiner,barrister,veterinary surgeon,and computer programming adviser.All of these fathers{commute} to work daily, mostly to Newcastle. Of the{mothers, 5}are full-time {housewives.}Amongst the others are 2 part-time nurses,a secretary,a lecturer in Music,an archivist a part-time hairdresser,and a University researcher. This shows the great{change in {country life-styles,}now that so many farms are mechanised.
